definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
the critical moment/life and death crisis
life and death are ruled by fate (idiom)
lit. the dead returning to life/a miracle (idiom)

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的转变也是如此，和颠覆身体的生死一样。

sentences.english: We saw a film yesterday. Its name was Speed.
sentences.chinese: 我们昨天看了一场电影，片名是《生死时速》。

sentences.english: Such sigh absolutly come from no excuse. such as suddenly thought of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 若干感慨，简直无来由，比如忽然想到生死。

sentences.english: In football and death alternative choice, Harry Kewell chose the former.
sentences.chinese: 在足球和生死二选一上，科威尔选择了足球。

sentences.english: In the germ-filled world, however, preventing infection is a matter of life and death.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在胚胎孕育中，防止感染就是生死攸关的问题。

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.
sentences.chinese: 按照马克思主义的说法，生死观就是世界观。

sentences.english: But for Eikhenbaum, there's obviously a lot at stake.
sentences.chinese: 但是对艾肯鲍姆却是生死攸关的。

sentences.english: Do not leave when she is poor, ill, or unbeautiful .
sentences.chinese: 不离不弃，无论贫穷，疾病，生死。

sentences.english: They even do not have a chance to see each other for a last glance.
sentences.chinese: 命运让生死不离的两个人连见最后一面的机会都没有。

sentences.english: Being David and Johnthan, they always help each other when in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 作为生死之交，他们总是在危急时刻互相帮助。

sentences.english: One of the core problems about philosophy concern life is human'slife and death.
sentences.chinese: 哲学关注生命的一个核心问题就是人的生死问题。

sentences.english: This was taken just before Newcastle's massive home game with Middlesbrough.
sentences.chinese: 图片摄于纽卡主场对阵米堡的生死大战前。

sentences.english: "Maybe they were fighting, " study leader Lambert said.
sentences.chinese: 领导学者兰伯特认为“或许他们曾展开生死搏斗”。

sentences.english: Tosun tzu, war is a matter of life and death. This is the key principle of histeachings.
sentences.chinese: 孙子认为战争关乎生死，这是他所提倡的关键原则。

sentences.english: It is a matter of life and death to me.
sentences.chinese: 那对我是生死交关的问题。

sentences.english: Our actions keeps us bound to the continuous cycle of worldly existence, to the endless round of birth and death.
sentences.chinese: 我们的行为把我们系缚在不断循环的生死轮回之中。

definition: to give no thought to/to have no regard for/to disregard
to live or die/to exist or perish
the critical moment/life and death crisis
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
variable/changeable/fickle/impermanence (Sanskrit: anitya)/ghost taking away the soul after death/to pass away/to die
separated in life and death/to part for ever
a hair's breadth apart/a fine line/a fine distinction
